info.name: Pokemon Showdown Dark (OUTDATED)
info.description: Re-skins the website to a darker version. Easier on the eyes.
info.additionalInfo:
My source code is a mess, I know. I can clean it up if someone really wants it.

EDIT: I had no idea they changed the layout on Showdown, and that my style was incompatible. I might make a new style if I have some time.

11/28/2015 - Changed title for clarity.

data.title: Any chance of this being updated?
